CellIterator.cc

00001 #include "CellIterator.hh"
00002 
00003 #include "Mapper.hh"
00004 
00005 namespace CALICE {
00006 
00007   CellIterator::CellIterator(const Mapper* mapper, const unsigned int index) : _mapper(mapper), _index(index) {
00008 
00009     _currentCellID = 0;
00010 
00011     if (_index == mapper->getMaxIndex() ) return; // special one after the end element
00012 
00013     try {
00014       _currentCellID = mapper->getCellIDOfIndex(_index);
00015     }
00016     catch (BadDataException &error) {
00017       ++(*this);
00018     }
00019   }
00020 
00021   void CellIterator::operator ++ () {
00022 
00023     bool validCell = false;
00024 
00025     while ( ! ( validCell || _index >= _mapper->getMaxIndex() ) ) {
00026 
00027       try {
00028         _currentCellID = _mapper->getCellIDOfIndex(++_index);
00029         validCell = true;
00030       }
00031       catch (BadDataException &error) {
00032       }
00033 
00034     }
00035 
00036     /* If mapping has changed and we are behind the one after the end element,
00037      * fix to new one after the end element.
00038      */
00039     if (_index > _mapper->getMaxIndex() ) _index = _mapper->getMaxIndex();
00040   }
00041 
00042 
00043 } //end namespsace CALICE
